message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $14,000. I think you'll find it's a very good deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your product has value, but given my budget, I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is a very reasonable price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I understand your position, but I must stick to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $12,500?
